noun.description: An ornamental hairnet or fabric bag worn over the hair at the back of a woman's head.
examples: her blonde hair was held in place by a velvet-mesh snood

noun.description: A wide ring of knitted material worn as a hood or scarf.
A short line attaching a hook to a main line in sea fishing.
examples: a bit of silver paper wrapped on the snood often triggers a bite

origin: Old English sn≈çd, of unknown origin.
